name: Traffic Engine: Fury Road Race
description:
Traffic Engine is a very dynamic racing game in middle of traffic.
You can choose one of 22 (MORE IN UPDATES!) best cars (sport cars, muscle cars, trucks, sedan and coupe, super cars) and show your driving skill. All cars has realistic detailed models and good engine sounds. Feel power of every car!

At release you can choose one of 6 maps. Europe, American and Russian roads are waiting for roar of your engine!

Also, you can choose between 4 types of game!
- One direction traffic;
- Two directions traffic;
- Time race;
- Bombed bus.

Main features:
- Stunning graphics;
- Realistic physics;
- Realistic sounds;
- Insane speed;
- Beautiful locations;
- 6 maps (more with updates!);
- 22 cars (more with updates!);
- 4 types of game!

*
Please, remember that traffic racing is fun ONLY IN GAMES! Do not try to repeat this in real life!
